trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: >90% unit test coverage; SonarQube quality gate pass (0 critical bugs, <5% code smell); All contract tests pass; SAST scan finds 0 new critical vulnerabilities.
tools_used: GitHub Actions, Jest, SonarQube, Pact, Snyk.
business_impact: Prevents defects and security issues from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: Deployment to Staging successful; Automated smoke test suite (critical path E2E) pass rate is 100%; All integration tests pass.
failure_action: Rollback deployment; Trigger P2 alert for on-call developer.
escalation_procedure: Automated alert to team chat channel.
business_impact: Ensures the Staging environment remains stable for further testing.

trigger_event: Manual trigger before a scheduled release
success_criteria: Full E2E regression suite pass rate is >99%; Performance benchmarks are met for all critical APIs; No open critical or high-severity bugs for the release scope; Manual exploratory testing sign-off from QA Lead; UAT sign-off from Product Owner.
responsible_team: QA Lead, DevOps Lead, Product Owner
business_impact: Prevents production incidents and ensures release quality.
